articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Browser Use, the tool making it easier for AI ‘agents’ to navigate websites, raises $17M - TechCrunch
articles.description: Browser Use, the 'agentic' framework used by Manus, among other platforms, has raised $17 million from investors including Paul Graham.
articles.content: We may not have an agreed-upon definition of AI “agent” yet, but a multitude of startups want to create “agentic” tools to automate various tasks online. One such firm, Browser Use, has attracted a t… [+2772 chars]
